summary: Project will support payments via Stripe with multiple payment methods enabled.
known_issues: Previous build attempt failed with 'AI was unable to complete your request' during payment-method requirements build.

existing_features.title: Update the admin Payment Settings UI to allow selecting which Stripe payment methods are enabled (card, cryptocurrency, Cash App, AU bank account) in addition to the existing secret key and allowed-countries fields, using clear English labels and validation.

Ensure the storefront checkout flow uses the updated Stripe configuration so that, when enabled, Stripe Checkout presents the additional payment methods to the buyer (subject to Stripe eligibility for the account/country/currency).

new_feature_requests.summary: Enable all relevant Stripe payment methods (card, cryptocurrency, Cash App, AU bank account)

Extend the backend Stripe configuration so an admin can enable Stripe Checkout payment methods for: card, cryptocurrency, Cash App, and Australian bank account (AU direct debit), and persist these settings in the canister configuration used by checkout-session creation.
